entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
